attributes.action: pass a law that stops travellers from illegal encampments & heavy fines imposed
attributes.additional_details: It took almost 2 weeks for the first travellers to be removed from the illegal encampment and within 24 hours another set up. So its very clear that neither our laws protect our citizens and the complete disregard and contempt that the traveller community has for law and order in this country
attributes.background: I want a immediate action taken on illegal traveller sites and fines imposed in the same manor as road safety cameras do for speeding.

rejection.details:
The Police, Crime, Sentencing and Courts Bill 2021, currently being considered by the House of Commons, contains measures to strengthen existing police powers to deal with unauthorised encampments.

You can find out more about the measures in the Bill relating to unauthorised encampments here:
https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/police-crime-sentencing-and-courts-bill-2021-factsheets/police-crime-sentencing-and-courts-bill-2021-unauthorised-encampments-factsheet

You can read more background on the measures in the Bill relating to unauthorised encampments here:
https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/research-briefings/cbp-9164/

You can see the Bill's progress through Parliament here:
https://bills.parliament.uk/bills/2839
